USB Stack

Collaboration diagram for USB Stack:

Modules

 USB Protocol Definitions
 USB Request Management
 USB Device Framework

Detailed Description

This subsystem is a framework for implementing applications where the board will act as a USB device, USB host or both.

The following diagram is a high-level overview of the USB subsystem architecture. The left side of the "USB Core" box is the USB Device framework, while the right side is the USB Host framework. An application may choose to use both or just one of the frameworks. The "OTG / transceiver" part is optional, but usually present when using a dual-role controller.

For more information on the various parts of the USB stack, please enter one of the submodules listed above.
